common.title: No-Install Utilities
common.description: Web-based utility tools for developers and general users, no login required

home.title: No-Install Utilities
home.subtitle: Web-based utility tools for developers and general users, no login required

fast.title: Fast & Simple
fast.description: Use directly in your browser without installation

secure.title: Secure Processing
secure.description: All data is processed locally in your browser (except IP utility)

responsive.title: Responsive Design
responsive.description: Works on PC, tablet, and mobile devices

index.title: Utilities
index.description: Collection of various web-based utility tools

characterCounter.title: Character Counter
characterCounter.description: Count characters, bytes, and words in real-time

info.title: Usage Tips
info.item1: Character count is calculated in real-time as you type
info.item2: View character count both with and without spaces and line breaks
info.item3: Accurately counts Korean, English, numbers, and special characters
info.item4: Use the copy button to save your text to the clipboard

myIp.title: Check My IP
myIp.description: Check your current IP address and location information

info.title: Information
info.item1: The displayed IP address is your current public IP address
info.item2: Location may differ if using VPN or proxy
info.item3: Location information is approximate and may not be accurate
info.item4: ISP stands for Internet Service Provider

uuidGenerator.title: UUID Generator
uuidGenerator.metaDescription: Generate UUID (Universally Unique Identifier). Create and copy unique identifiers in UUID v4 format.

info.title: What is UUID?
info.item1: UUID is a universally unique identifier with virtually no chance of duplication
info.item2: Generates Version 4 UUIDs, which are randomly generated
info.item3: Used for database IDs, file names, session IDs, and more

passwordGenerator.title: Password Generator
passwordGenerator.metaDescription: Generate secure and strong passwords. Create highly secure passwords by combining uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters.
passwordGenerator.generatePrompt: Set options and generate a password

info.title: Secure Password Guide
info.item1: Minimum length of 12 characters is recommended
info.item2: Including uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and symbols makes it more secure
info.item3: Use a unique password for each account

hashGenerator.title: Hash Generator
hashGenerator.description: Convert text to various hash formats
hashGenerator.metaDescription: Generate MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, and SHA-512 hashes. See real-time results from various hash algorithms as you type.

info.title: Hash Algorithm Information
info.item1: MD5: 128-bit hash, not recommended for security
info.item2: SHA-1: 160-bit hash, not recommended for security
info.item3: SHA-256: 256-bit hash, secure cryptographic hash function
info.item4: SHA-512: 512-bit hash, most robust cryptographic hash function

qrGenerator.title: QR Code Generator
qrGenerator.description: Convert text or URL to QR code
qrGenerator.metaDescription: QR code generator that converts text or URLs into QR codes. Generate and download QR codes with various sizes and error recovery levels.
qrGenerator.inputPlaceholder: Enter content to convert to QR code...
qrGenerator.placeholderText:
Enter text to
generate QR code
qrGenerator.generateFirst: Please generate a QR code first

info.title: Usage Guide
info.item1: Convert various information such as URLs, text, and phone numbers to QR codes
info.item2: Higher error recovery levels allow QR codes to be read even when damaged
info.item3: Adjust the size to generate QR codes for your needs
info.item4: Generated QR codes can be downloaded as PNG images

wifiQr.title: WiFi QR Generator
wifiQr.description: Generate QR code for WiFi connection
wifiQr.metaDescription: Convert WiFi network information into QR codes for easy sharing. Scan the QR code with a smartphone to connect to WiFi automatically.
wifiQr.passwordRequired: Password is required for selected security type

info.title: How to Use
info.item1: Enter your WiFi network name (SSID) and password
info.item2: Click the Generate QR Code button to create the code
info.item3: Scan the QR code with your smartphone camera to connect to WiFi automatically
info.item4: Some older devices may not support WiFi QR codes
info.item5: For security, only share the generated QR code with trusted people

frontMessages.NO_TRANSLATION: Translation not found for this message.
frontMessages.NETWORK_ERROR: A network error occurred. Please check your network connection.
